title: Deep Reinforcement Learning-based Millimeter-Wave Beam Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic principles of wireless communication, foundational machine learning, and programming experience
context.additional_context: Advanced communication technology training program for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain core technical elements of millimeter-wave communication and the beam training process.
Learners can analyze and simulate the principles of applying deep reinforcement learning (DRL) to wireless communication environments.
Learners can propose improvement strategies for real-time beam training algorithms using interactive learning design (ILDP).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
